item.title: Lauren add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Lauren add a quote by Allen Saunders
item.description: "Life is what happens to you while you're busy making other plans." -- Allen Saunders

item.title: Lauren add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "I'm selfish, impatient and a little insecure. I make mistakes, I am out of control and at times hard to handle. But if you can't handle me at my worst, then you sure as hell don't deserve me at my best." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Lauren add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "The nicest thing for me is sleep, then at least I can dream." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Lauren add a quote by Marthe Troly-Curtin
item.description: "Time you enjoy wasting is not wasted time." -- Marthe Troly-Curtin

item.title: Lauren add a quote by John Lennon
item.description: "You may say I'm a dreamer, but I'm not the only one. I hope someday you'll join us. And the world will live as one." -- John Lennon

item.title: Lauren add a quote by Marian Keyes
item.description: "The feel of them (books) and the smell of them. A bookshop was like an Aladdin's cave for me. Entire worlds and lives can be found just behind that glossy cover. All you had to do was look." Claire (Watermelon)" -- Marian Keyes

item.title: Lauren add a quote by Marian Keyes
item.description: "What doesn't kill us makes us funnier." -- Marian Keyes

item.title: Lauren add a quote by Paul McCartney
item.description: "And, in the end The love you take is equal to the love you make." -- Paul McCartney

item.title: Lauren add a quote by John Lennon
item.description: "The more I see, the less I know for sure." -- John Lennon

item.title: Lauren add a quote by John Lennon
item.description: "Living is Easy with Eyes Closed." -- John Lennon

item.title: Lauren add a quote by George Harrison
item.description: "All things must pass." -- George Harrison

item.title: Lauren add a quote by Paul McCartney
item.description: "If slaughterhouses had glass walls, everyone would be a vegetarian." -- Paul McCartney

item.title: Lauren add a quote by George Bernard Shaw
item.description: "Animals are my friends...and I don't eat my friends." -- George Bernard Shaw

item.title: Lauren add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "It does not do to dwell on dreams and forget to live." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Lauren add a quote by Roald Dahl
item.description: "Those who don't believe in magic will never find it." -- Roald Dahl

item.title: Lauren add a quote by Kathryn Stockett
item.description: "You is kind. You is smart. You is important." -- Kathryn Stockett

item.title: Lauren add a quote by Harper Lee
item.description: "Until I feared I would lose it, I never loved to read. One does not love breathing." -- Harper Lee

item.title: Lauren add a quote by Harper Lee
item.description: "You never really understand a person until you consider things from his point of view... Until you climb inside of his skin and walk around in it." -- Harper Lee

item.title: Lauren add a quote by Harper Lee
item.description: "People generally see what they look for, and hear what they listen for." -- Harper Lee

item.title: Lauren add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Be yourself; everyone else is already taken." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Lauren add a quote by Ernest Hemingway
item.description: "There is no friend as loyal as a book." -- Ernest Hemingway

item.title: Lauren add a quote by George Harrison
item.description: "With every mistake, we must surely be learning." -- George Harrison

item.title: Lauren add a quote by Paul McCartney
item.description: "You can judge a man's true character by the way he treats his fellow animals." -- Paul McCartney

item.title: Lauren add a quote by Audrey Hepburn
item.description: "Nothing is impossible, the word itself says 'I'm possible'!" -- Audrey Hepburn

item.title: Lauren add a quote by Audrey Hepburn
item.description: "The most important thing is to enjoy your life—to be happy—it's all that matters." -- Audrey Hepburn

item.title: Lauren add a quote by Karl Pilkington
item.description: "[Jellyfish] are 97% water or something, so how much are they doing? Just give them another 3% and make them water. It's more useful." -- Karl Pilkington
